builtin_funcs.input: Read a string from the standard input.
builtin_funcs.range: Return a list of integers from start to end, with step.
builtin_funcs.find: Return the index of the first occurrence of a substring provided in a string.
builtin_funcs.count: Return the number of non-overlapping occurrences of a substring provided in a string.
builtin_funcs.findall: Return a list of all occurrences of a substring provided in a string.
builtin_funcs.string: Return a string consisting of the characters in the specified sequence.
builtin_funcs.int: Convert the argument to an integer.
builtin_funcs.float: Convert the argument to a floating-point number.
builtin_funcs.bool: Convert the argument to a Boolean value.
builtin_funcs.len: Return the length of the string argument.
builtin_funcs.exit: Exit the program with the provided exit code.
